pages.privacy: Construction Equipment Rental in India | ConstructHire | Privacy Policy Home About us Features Catalog Get in touch Privacy Policy At ConstructHire, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the data you provide to us. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and project details when you fill out our online forms or interact with our website. We also gather non-personal information through cookies and web analytics tools to improve our services. How We Use Your Information The information we collect is used to process your equipment rental inquiries, provide quotes, and communicate with you about our services. We may also use non-personal data for website optimization and marketing purposes. Data Security We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Third-Party Sharing We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or serving you. Your Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information by contacting us. You may also opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. Updates to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to review this page periodically for the latest information. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or data practices, please contact us at constructhire@gmail.com Our extensive fleet includes excavators, cranes, bulldozers, backhoe loaders, motor graders, and more, sourced from trusted brands and meticulously maintained to ensure optimal performance. 3rd Floor, Solitaire Business Hub, S No 208/206, Office 319/320, opp. Ambience hotel, Wakad, Pune, Maharashtra 411057, India constructhire@gmail.com +917722025566 Useful Links Home About us Features Catalog Get in touch Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
pages.terms: Construction Equipment Rental in India | ConstructHire | Terms and Conditions Home About us Features Catalog Get in touch Terms and Conditions Welcome to ConstructHire! By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. 1. Acceptance of Terms By using our website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. 2. Services ConstructHire provides an online platform for renting construction equipment. We strive to ensure the accuracy of information on our website, but we do not guarantee the availability or suitability of any specific equipment for your project. 3. Rental Agreement Upon booking equipment through our website, you will be required to enter into a separate rental agreement with ConstructHire or our partner rental companies. The rental agreement will govern the specific terms and conditions of the equipment rental. 4. Pricing and Payment All prices displayed on our website are subject to change without notice. You are responsible for paying the applicable rental fees, taxes, and any additional charges outlined in the rental agreement. 5. Liability and Indemnification ConstructHire is not liable for any damages, injuries, or losses resulting from the use of rented equipment. You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, liabilities, or expenses arising from your use of our services. 6. Intellectual Property All content and materials on our website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and images, are the intellectual property of ConstructHire and are protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws. 7. Modifications and Termination We reserve the right to modify or terminate these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our services after any modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms. 8. Governing Law These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India.
